WRITING.TEXT:
(Trigger Warning)
Who?
Ughhhhh.....
No. She was probably replaced.
Im 16. I guess it may be because I don't watch the news very often. Heck, the only reason I know Zealandia is a thing (dog bless us) is because my facebook feed was blasted with the stuff.
Wait everyone thinks he's dead until season 3 or 4 and the antagonists are another one, "Samaratin", and that's the NSA. Correct?
I discovered it on Friday. Thanks, ToS discord.

No, I don't recall Edward Snowden. Im probably too young. But I just remembered a TV show that sounds like the NSA..."Person Of Interest", about a guy who designed a "Machine" that is an Artificial Super-Intelligence, a true one. That the NSA?
Yea, but at the same time that also nerfs it due to...y'know... the jester possibility.

Yes, I agree, but the chances of him actually killing a bad guy are less than 50% at the beginning of the game, and I must admit, those chances do increase the further in we go. At the same time, the chances of him staying alive might decrease, causing him to act drastically and killing the...Jailor in order to revive the invest. Not a fair trade.
The chances of killing a useful role to kill are so small to begin with, it doesn't seem like it would be too much of an issue to add the ability to kill NI roles, too. Hypothetically, of course.

Hi hope.
I hope (pun not intended) that you and elsie can get through this together. For the sake of your sanity, stay safe.
**Boom.** Possible Jester claim.
I mean, if you want to bring back the jailor, dont kill the possible mafioso, kill something like the WW or Arso.
I agree...he was possibly a NSA agent, whatever that is. (I'm not from America, so don't go over the top like most people do on the internet.)

That being said, he isn't as powerful as, say, a Mayor, as he can prove multiple townies just by deduction. And, whoever he votes, most of the town votes. He can also prove towns by just saying outright e.g. if hes jailed.
Why was this deleted?
7 comments. I can only see 3.

I beg to differ. The most useful role in the game is the jailor. He is a TP, TI, TS and TK in one role.
TP Aspect: Can protect known towns (most notably Mayor) from any harm except for jester hauntings.
TI Aspect: Can ask for roles and has the ability to write down claims. Be careful though, one wrong step and he could become
TK Aspect: Pretty much a vig, but can go through Night Immune's and instead of suicide after executing a town he just no longer has the ability to execute.
TS Aspect: Can roleblock everyone and everything, including Witch. Same effects as escort if RBing an SK without executing, same with WW on full moon.
And the ret? Can revive one townie from the dead. No kills, no investigations, no protection. Sure he can prove a townie, but if he dies N1 or 2? Nadah.
No, actually. You'd have to be very skilled and observant to use him to his full potential, e.g dont waste the revive on a Mafioso - Jailor trade, go for the big kills.
And haven't read the whole story.
Love it.
I live in New Zealand. Come fish me bby ;-)
I noticed that too.
That can't happen anymore.
I just lost my shit at that.
Hmm... Maybe the ret can also kill NI roles, as he is literally destroying the soul. He could become the most useful role in the game.
Im not an expert on the supernatural. I only recently had my first encounter on all things spiritual, and that was the ghost of my Grandfather.

"all 1 comments"
WHERE!?!?! Roy, if this is you, show me.
UPDATE: A streetlamp just exploded outside of my apartment, not kidding. This is freaking me the fuck out.
That is utterly terrifying.

Now, this is going to be really chilling, but I think a skin-walker is inside of Elsie. If this is the case, she's probably dead. I *really* ***REALLY*** hope this isn't the case. Look up the symptoms of a skin-walker posession, and tell me if that sounds like Elsie. Another possibility is a fae. That would also be terrible, but not as bad as a demon wearing her skin.
I think you should definitely hide recorders around the house. A place inconspicuous, but easy to reach, like in the couch.
They were for depression.
OP mentioned it was depression at some point.

HEY
We are number one!
Oh my god...thats Jason Bourne.
Nah, Nah..
Oh please. Im not heading across the ditch.
Poor Mrs Fill...Im sorry...

Honestly, this creeps me out because you just described what I've felt for...what...10 months now. I've felt that I've stopped existing. Is this the reality you were trying to discontinue? Or is this another reality? Is this why I felt like Zealandia was already a known continent, yet the paper announcing the findings to the public was published today (my birthday)? Is this reality inside my head as I'm being wiped from existence? Please, /u/Hollywoodisburning, I need answers.

Woah... where did the English convicts go in the 16/1700's? That is - the years 1600 to about 1700 or 1750? Another question, does your continuity have a series of islands, recently discovered to be a continent in it's own right called New Zealand?
Wikipedia obviously exists in that continuation, too. I wouldnt be surprised, there are an infinite number of universes, each with an infinite number of variables.
*Shudders* Im not too far from there.
Ohhhh. That is thrilling stuff.
*shakes head*
I mean...it is called "Numbers"...
Just watch out for a bee!
Lol that looks good.

WRITING.TITLE: This is clickbait.
WRITING.TEXT: First of all, I told you this was click bait, ~~So I can say with 100% proof that you are gullible.~~ yet you fell for it. Now that you're here, then, what's the most outlandish vet-bait you ever did, and what was the outcome?
